name: GSI Crossover Kitchen Kit
description: Everything you need to spice up and cook up a gourmet basecamp feast.Includes a camp towel, scrubby pad, soap bottle, compact scraper, pivot tongs, pivot spoon, and pivot spatula. Also a cutting board, oil bottle, and spicer.Nests inside sets such as the Pinacle Backpacker set.Separate wet and dry compartments are good for on-trail maintenance.
